thread.title: The dangerous life of a Venezuelan trucker

title: The dangerous life of a Venezuelan trucker
text:
The dangerous life of a Venezuelan trucker 6:49pm GMT - 02:30 
With hunger and scarcity widespread around its crisis-hit economy, Venezuela has seen a frightening upsurge of looting and attacks on its increasingly anarchic roads in recent weeks. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
With hunger and scarcity widespread around its crisis-hit economy, Venezuela has seen a frightening upsurge of looting and attacks on its increasingly anarchic roads in recent weeks.
